title: No Experience From games

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I've been playing some games on my other account and it wont level at all as seen above.

replies.body: This looks like a visual issue, I recommend posting it on the [bug boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).   To offer some ease, I looked into this for you and confirmed you received 457 XP for that match!
